name: Made.com
description: Made.com is an innovative online furniture and home décor retailer based in the UK, specializing in delivering high-quality, stylish products directly to consumers. Founded in 2010, Made.com aims to disrupt traditional furniture retailing by cutting out the middlemen and offering designer-led products at accessible prices. The company collaborates with a network of independent designers and artisans to create unique pieces that embody contemporary aesthetics and functionality. Made.com is known for its extensive range of furniture, including sofas, beds, tables, and storage solutions, alongside a curated selection of home accessories. With a strong focus on sustainability, the company is committed to ethical sourcing and reducing waste throughout its supply chain. Made.com operates primarily through its e-commerce platform, providing a seamless shopping experience and engaging customers with inspiring content and design ideas. The brand has expanded its presence across Europe, leveraging technology and data analytics to enhance customer personalization and improve operational efficiency. As a leader in online home retail, Made.com continues to innovate, aiming to redefine how consumers approach home furnishing in the digital age.

seo.meta_title: Made.com | Stylish Furniture and Home Décor Online
seo.meta_description: Explore Made.com for modern furniture and home décor. Discover unique designs at accessible prices, and redefine your living space with our curated selections.

faq.question: What does Made.com specialize in?
faq.answer: Made.com specializes in stylish furniture and home décor, offering designer-led products online.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Made.com?
faq.answer: Philippe Chainieux is the CEO of Made.com.

faq.question: Where is Made.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Made.com is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.

faq.question: What types of products does Made.com offer?
faq.answer: Made.com offers a wide range of furniture including sofas, beds, and dining tables, as well as home accessories.
